Safety: CPS Involvement YES CPS involvment comment: Jayvon was adopted by Michael and Mary Cote on June 14th, 2016 through Cumberland County Children & Youth Services. Per mother’s report, CYS became involved again during May of 2022 at the request of parents due to Jayvon's unsafe behaviors within the home and towards himself. Please note that there were no concerns for parental maltreatment or neglect. Once removed from the residence, Jayvon was placed at Kids Peace in Allentown, PA from June 23rd, 2022 to July 20th, 2022 before being transferred to Gemma Residential Treatment Facility. Cumberland County CYS closed the case in July of 2022 post Jayvon’s RTF placement.
Permanency: Facility Contact: Jayvon presently resides at Gemma Residential Facility, located at 512 West Township Line Road, Plymouth Meeting, Pennsylvania 19462

Grade Comment: Due to Jayvon being admitted to an RTF, he will either attend Montgomery County IU or Martin Luther School in the fall, which is located on the campus of Gemma Services. He will be in the 4th grade for the 2022-2023 academic year.
Patient living situation: PARENT(S);CHILDREN IN THE HOME
